description: This file defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for authentication-related endpoints, including login requests, registration requests, and token responses.

classes.name: AuthDtos
classes.description: A container class for authentication DTO records.

methods.name: AuthDtos.LoginRequest
methods.description: DTO record for login request containing username and password.

methods.name: AuthDtos.RegisterRequest
methods.description: DTO record for registration request containing username, password, email, and roles.

methods.name: AuthDtos.TokenResponse
methods.description: DTO record for token response containing token, username, and roles.
